parameters.name: XOnLine

parameters.description: y coordinate where to begin the jog on the selected line

parameters.name: ZOnLine
parameters.description: z coordinate where to begin the jog on the selected line

parameters.name: XOnJog
parameters.description: x coordinate of the width and depth of the jog

parameters.name: YOnJog
parameters.description: y coordinate of the width and depth of the jog

parameters.name: ZOnJog
parameters.description: z coordinate of the width and depth of the jog

title: ISketchSegment.JogLine
description: Creates rectangular jog on the specified line.
signature:

   System.Double
XOnLine
,
   System.Double
YOnLine
,
   System.Double
ZOnLine
,

XOnJog
,
   System.Double
YOnJog
,
   System.Double
ZOnJog
)
